snippet.title: Everafter Falls | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Everafter Falls on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1416960/Everafter_Falls/

Rediscover the simple life. Farm, fish, forge and fight to restore the peace in an all-new farming adventure. Features split-screen coop, a pet with useful skills, automated drones, resource-harvesting pixies, a card-eating progression system, and dangerous dungeons to explore!
